OUTPUT: ['Eating disorders are serious mental health conditions that can have severe physical and emotional consequences, and they should not be taken lightly or romanticized.', 'It is essential to prioritize self-care, seek professional help when needed, and avoid perpetuating harmful stereotypes or glamorizations of eating disorders.', 'There are also many resources available online, such as the National Eating Disorders Association (NEDA) and the American Psychological Association (APA), that can provide valuable information and support.']
